body:
Hello Everyone!..

I would just like to tell everyone that I am leaving Avicus/McZone (Just to be clear Avicus, not MineCraft)... After about 2 years of game play, I am officially leaving. I am mostly leaving because of the intense lagg that I am receiving and it is not my internet or MineCraft 1.8.3 ... The new update has put me off due to the fact that everyone looses there prestige rank and I have been unhappy lately and I am finally over it and overwhelm by it. My decision was greatly based on the new update right when school holidays start here in Aussie and the loss of my prestige  (even 1st prestige put me off) . I have met and enjoyed participating with other players and like to thank everyone for the wonderful years. Avicus has enabled me to absorb all of other player's experience and I have evolved from it thanks to Avicus. Now when I play SkyWars it's really is easy. 

There are enormous amount of skilled and advanced players out there so me leaving won't affect anything but I hope everyone can enjoy Avicus just like I have.

I might be re-join if I see changes.

title: Hey, I am Leaving!

replies.body: Ok, see ya! Good Luck and Have Fun in life o/
replies.body_tagged: Ok, see ya! Good Luck and Have Fun in life o/

replies.body: Bye man. good luck in life ;)
